7 std::vector<cv::Mat> splitLadybug(cv::Mat ladybugImage, std::string colorCode)
8 {
9  // rotate
10  cv::Mat rotImage;
11  cv::Mat rot_mat = cv::getRotationMatrix2D(cv::Point2f(3*IMAGE_WIDTH, 3*IMAGE_WIDTH), -90, 1);
12  warpAffine(ladybugImage, rotImage, rot_mat, cv::Size(NUM_CAMERAS*IMAGE_WIDTH,IMAGE_HEIGHT));
13 
14  // convert to specified color code
15  cv::cvtColor(rotImage, rotImage, CV_BayerRG2BGR);
16  if(colorCode == MONO)
17  {
18  cv::cvtColor(rotImage, rotImage, CV_BGR2GRAY);
19  }
20 
21  // split image and store in vector
22  std::vector<cv::Mat> splitImages_unsorted;
23  for(int i=0; i<NUM_CAMERAS; i++)
24  {
25  int offset = i * IMAGE_WIDTH;
26  cv::Mat im = rotImage.rowRange(0, IMAGE_HEIGHT).colRange(offset, offset+IMAGE_WIDTH);
27  splitImages_unsorted.push_back(im);
28  }
29 
30  // order vector
31  std::vector<cv::Mat> splitImages;
32  for(int i=0; i<NUM_CAMERAS; i++)
33  {
34  splitImages.push_back(splitImages_unsorted[CAMERA_POSITIONS[i]]);
35  }
36 
37  return splitImages;
38 }
39 
45 void getLeftRightCameras(int cam, int &camLeft, int &camRight)
46 {
47  // negative camera index: assume it's camera 0 (first camera in the ring)
48  if(cam < 0)
49  {
50  cam = 0;
51  }
52 
53  // too large camera index: assume it's camera 4 (last camera in the ring)
54  if(cam > NUM_CAMERAS-2)
55  {
56  cam = 4;
57  }
58 
59  camLeft = cam - 1;
60  camRight = cam + 1;
61 
62  if(camLeft == -1)
63  {
64  camLeft = NUM_CAMERAS - 2;
65  }
66  if(camRight == NUM_CAMERAS - 1)
67  {
68  camRight = 0;
69  }
70 }
